turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi there, how can i help you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi there, I'd like to place an order from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, let's do it. what do you want to order from there?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I want two large pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, what do you want on those pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. For the first pizza, I want bacon, sausage, pepperoni, and mushrooms. And then for the second pizza, I want some green peppers and black olives.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sounds delicious. to confirm, you said u want 2 large pizzas, 1 with bacon, sausage, pepperoni, and mushrooms. 1 with green peppers and black olives.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, they they both have to be on a thin crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: oh, got it, let me add that to your order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so that was 2 large pizzas with thin crusts, 1 with bacon, sausage, pepperoni, and mushrooms. 1 with green peppers and black olives.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: say "yes" if i got that correct.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that's it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: (deleted)

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great! $36 is your total.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right. That sounds good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you want to place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. Yes, I do.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, the order has been placed. the pizzas should be ready for pick up in 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's it. Thanks a lot.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're very welcome.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: enjoy.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.
